attributes.additional_details: Instead of "same sex marriage", I call on the govt to create a new state in law ("garriage") to more precisely recognise, accommodate & measure these relationships. Be creative & respect difference with a new legal state that people can, if they really wish, aspire to & claim for their own. Govt should respect the differences in male and female - biological and eradicable - by permitting plurality, not diluting what works well. See http://excalibrate.wordpress.com/2012/12/26/garriagetm-finding-a-workable-compromise/
